summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 10, 11 and 12, Block 2, Dingley's Addition (Unrecorded), and Lot 20, Block 7, Queen Anne Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-245 and 17-193, respectively.
